com.sterlingcommerce.ui.web.framework

Class SCUIException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • java.lang.RuntimeException
          • com.sterlingcommerce.ui.web.framework.SCUIException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SCUIAttributeExistsException, SCUIAuthorizationException, SCUIMashupException, SCUIValidationException

    public class SCUIException
extends java.lang.RuntimeException
    SCUIException is the general exception that any runtime exception in the UI backend class will extend. rasrinivasan
    See Also:

        public SCUIException()

      • SCUIException

        public SCUIException(java.lang.String exceptionString)

      • SCUIException

        public SCUIException(java.lang.String exceptionString,
                     java.lang.Throwable rootCauseException)
        Constructs an SCUIException instance and sets the exceptionString and rootCauseException attributes. Use this to construct an SCUIException object when you want to wrap SCUIException around another exception exceptionString of the type String. rootCauseException of the type Throwable.

        public org.w3c.dom.Document getExceptionAsXML()
        This method returns XML for this exception with the exception String as an attribute in the below format.
        <response success="false" em="exceptionString"$gt; </response> the exceptionAsXML of type XML Document

      • getExceptionAsXML

        public org.w3c.dom.Document getExceptionAsXML(boolean hasStackTracePermission)
        This method returns XML for the exception along with the stacktrace as one of the attribute if the hasStackTracePermission is given as true. hasStackTracePermission that gives the permission to see stack trace the exceptionAsXML of type XML Document
